clinical_study.brief_title: AMS VS MOXI Ketek vs Avelox in AMS

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical efficacy between telithromycin and moxifloxacin at the post-therapy/test of cure visit, and to assess the safety of telithromycin given once daily for 5 days vs moxifloxacin given once daily for 10 days in the treatment of subjects with AMS.

primary_outcome.measure: To demonstrate equivalence in clinical efficacy between telithromycin and moxifloxacin at the post-therapy/test of cure (TOC) visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess the safety of telithromycin given once daily for 5 days vs moxifloxacin given once daily for 10 days in the treatment of subjects with AMS.
